Wisdom: كُلُّ مَا زَادَ عَلَى الِاقْتِصَادِ إِسْرَافٌ
enWisdom: Everything that exceeds moderation is extravagance
That which is above sufficiency is extravagance

Wisdom: الْإِسْرَافُ مَذْمُومٌ فِي كُلِّ شَيْ‏ءٍ إِلَّا فِي أَفْعَالِ الْبِرِّ
enWisdom: Extravagance is blameworthy in everything except in doing good deeds

Wisdom: أَلَا وَإِنَّ إِعْطَاءَ هَذَا الْمَالِ فِي غَيْرِ حَقِّهِ تَبْذِيرٌ وَإِسْرَافٌ
enWisdom: Verily giving this wealth where it has no right to be given is wastefulness and extravagance
The ugliest [form of] giving is extravagance

Wisdom: حَلُّوا أَنْفُسَكُمْ بِالْعَفَافِ وَتَجَنَّبُوا [اجْتَنِبُوا] التَّبْذِيرَ وَالْإِسْرَافَ
enWisdom: Noble traits [and deeds] are not complete except with chastity and self-sacrifice

Wisdom: ذَرِ الْإِسْرَافَ مُقْتَصِداً وَاذْكُرْ فِي الْيَوْمِ غَداً
enWisdom: Abandon extravagance by economizing, and recall [your] tomorrow today

Wisdom: ذَرِ السَّرَفَ فَإِنَّ الْمُسْرِفَ لَا يُحْمَدُ جُودُهُ وَلَا يُرْحَمُ فَقْرُهُ
enWisdom: Eschew extravagance, for neither is the generosity of the extravagant praised nor is his indigence sympathized [with]
The cause of poverty is extravagance
The disgrace of generosity is extravagance

Wisdom: فَدَعِ الْإِسْرَافَ مُقْتَصِداً وَاذْكُرْ فِي الْيَوْمِ غَداً وَأَمْسِكْ مِنَ الْمَالِ بِقَدْرِ ضَرُورَتِكَ وَقَدِّمِ الْفَضْلَ لِيَوْمِ حَاجَتِكَ
enWisdom: Then shun extravagance by economizing, and recall today [what you will need] tomorrow; hold on to wealth [only] to the extent of your necessity and send forth the surplus for the day when you will need it
There is no honour in extravagance

Wisdom: مِنَ الْمُرُوَّةِ أَنْ تَقْتَصِدَ فَلَا تُسْرِفَ وَتَعِدَ فَلَا تُخْلِفَ
enWisdom: It is part of magnanimity for you to be moderate and not extravagant, and to keep the promises you make

Wisdom: وَيْحَ الْمُسْرِفِ مَا أَبْعَدَهُ عَنْ صَلَاحِ نَفْسِهِ وَاسْتِدْرَاكِ أَمْرِهِ
enWisdom: Woe be to the extravagant! How far he is from reforming himself and setting right his affair!

Wisdom: لَا تَبْخَلْ فَتُقَتِّرَ وَلَا تُسْرِفْ فَتُفْرِطَ
enWisdom: There is no affluence with extravagance
There is no affluence with extravagance
